recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Simple spaghetti with rich meat sauce
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic, and sauté until softened.
Add the minced beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the canned tomatoes, tomato paste, and dried oregano. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti and enjoy!

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.description: Simple rich and moist chocolate cake
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt the chocolate and butter together.
Mix the sugar and eggs in a bowl until fluffy.
Gradually add the melted chocolate mixture.
Sift in the flour and baking powder, and mix well.
Pour into a greased baking tin and bake for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
Add croutons, grated Parmesan, and sliced boiled eggs.
Drizzle Caesar dressing on top and toss well.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden brown.
Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Pour in the tomato puree and coconut milk.
Simmer for 25 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.
Serve hot with rice.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour in the batter.
Cook each side for 2-3 minutes until golden brown.
Serve with syrup, fruits, or toppings of choice.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat the vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add the mixed vegetables and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce
oyster sauce
and sesame oil.
Cook for another 2 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipes.name: Tom Yum Kung
recipes.description: Simple thai hot and sour soup with shrimp
instructions: Boil water in a pot and add smashed lemongrass, lime leaves, and galangal.
Add shrimp and mushrooms to the boiling broth.
Season the soup with fish sauce and lime juice.
Taste and adjust seasoning as desired.
Serve hot and garnish with fresh coriander leaves.

recipes.name: Som Tum Thai
recipes.description: Simple but spicy Thai green papaya salad
instructions: Peel and shred the green papaya into thin strips.
In a mortar, pound garlic and chilies together until coarse.
Add palm sugar, fish sauce, and lime juice, mixing until combined.
Toss the shredded papaya with cherry tomatoes and the dressing.
Top with roasted peanuts and serve fresh.

recipes.name: Pad Kraphao
instructions: Crush garlic and chilies together and fry in hot oil until fragrant.
Add ground chicken and stir-fry until cooked.
Season with soy sauce, fish sauce, and sugar, stirring well.
Add Thai basil leaves and cook until wilted.
Serve hot with steamed rice and a fried egg on top.

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry
recipes.description: Simple creamy green curry with chicken
instructions: Heat a pan and fry green curry paste until fragrant.
Add coconut milk and stir until well combined.
Add chicken pieces, eggplant, and bamboo shoots, cooking until tender.
Season with fish sauce and palm sugar.
Garnish with Thai basil leaves and serve hot.

recipes.name: Kai Grata
instructions: Heat a small pan and crack eggs directly into it.
Add sausage slices and cook until the eggs are set.
Drizzle with soy sauce and sprinkle with chopped green onions.
Serve directly from the pan.

recipes.name: Khao Tom
recipes.description: Simple Thai rice soup for your breakfast
instructions: Heat chicken broth in a pot and add minced garlic.
Add ground pork and cook until fully done.
Stir in cooked rice and simmer for 5 minutes.
Season with fish sauce and garnish with fresh cilantro.
Serve warm as a hearty breakfast dish.

recipes.name: Thai Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with fish sauce until frothy.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan until hot.
Pour the egg mixture into the pan and fry until crispy.
Flip and cook the other side for 1-2 minutes.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Mango Sticky Rice
recipes.description: Simple sweet sticky rice with mango
instructions: Cook glutinous rice until soft.
Heat coconut milk with sugar until dissolved.
Mix the coconut milk with the cooked rice and let it sit for 10 minutes.
Serve with ripe mango slices and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Tom Yum
recipes.description: Simple spicy and sour vegeterian soup
instructions: Boil water in a pot and add smashed lemongrass, lime leaves, and galangal.
Add mushrooms to the boiling broth.
Season with lime juice, soy sauce, and sugar.
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.
Serve hot with fresh cilantro garnish.
